name: BAE 2
description: BAE 2 is a simple puzzle game in which your task is to destroy all black cubes, and do so all the white appeared on the platform.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7/8/10 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Video card must be 256 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 40 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 7/8/10 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Video card must be 256 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 40 MB available space
